Traits.Name: Skirmisher
Traits.Description: Can move diagonally and dash action is full speed.

Traits.Name: Dodge
Traits.Description: Immune to damage from successful saves, area effects, or missed attacks.

Traits.Name: Phasing
Traits.Description: Can ignore obstruction and pass through, but not end your turn in, terrain or characters.

Traits.Name: Legion
Traits.Description: Up to two foes with Legion can take their turns at the same time.
Traits.DescriptionNonessential: A foe with this trait has reduced stats but costs half the encounter points.

Interrupts.Name: Unstable Reality
Interrupts.Effect: This character teleports 1 space after the triggering ability resolves. This interrupt can be taken any number of times a round.

Actions.Name: Life Drain
Actions.Description: A bloodied foe in range 3 must save or lose all vigor, then takes [D].

Actions.Name: Terrorize
Actions.Description: A foe in range 4 must save or become blinded+ and gains +1 curse on all attacks and saves until it ends a turn adjacent to an ally. Bloodied foes fail the save.

Actions.Name: Hamstring
Actions.Effect: On hit, until the end of their next turn, foe takes 1 piercing damage for each space they move.

Actions.Name: Arc Whip
Actions.Description: A character in range 4 must save. On a failed save, they take [D], are slowed, and are electrified. Electrified characters fail the save.
